original: Generic cigarettes that don't taste generic.  At this price, you can't afford not to smoke!  You might find that these cigarettes taste a little different from your normal Debonaires and that the name is misspelled on some of the packaging (Hernando won't work in this town again).  This is all in your head.  After a few packs, we promise that it will start to feel less like you are sucking on a tractor exhaust.
translated: 味道不普通的普通香烟。如此低廉的价格，再不抽就亏大发了！你可能会发现，这些香烟的味道与平常抽的Debonaire不太一样，有些包装上的名字还印错了 (山寨的Hernando已经骗不到人了)。但这些其实是你的错觉。抽个几包，你就不会觉得自己是在吸拖拉机的排气管了。
